Two-Handed.name: Thorned Vine Chain
Two-Handed.description: A chain of spiked vines, perfect for entangling and piercing.

Two-Handed.name: Melonblade
Two-Handed.description: A heavy, melon-shaped blade that delivers juicy cuts.

Two-Handed.name: Berry Flail
Two-Handed.description: A flail with berry-shaped knots, combining sweetness with impact.

Two-Handed.name: Glaive of the Grove
Two-Handed.description: A long, leaf-bladed glaive, as elegant as it is sharp.

Two-Handed.name: Great Axe of Orchard's Might
Two-Handed.description: A large axe, ideal for chopping more than just trees.

Two-Handed.name: Great Club of the Orchard
Two-Handed.description: A hefty club made from the sturdiest branch of an ancient tree.

Two-Handed.name: Sword of the Grand Harvest
Two-Handed.description: A majestic sword that reaps enemies as if they were ripe fruits.

Two-Handed.name: Guisarme of Vines
Two-Handed.description: A polearm with a curved blade, entwined with thorny vines.

Two-Handed.name: Halberd of the Treetop Sentinel
Two-Handed.description: A versatile halberd for guarding the sacred groves.

Two-Handed.name: Lance of the Citrus Knight
Two-Handed.description: A lance as sharp as a citrus thorn, used by the bravest fruit knights.

Two-Handed.name: Long Spear of the Berry Guard
Two-Handed.description: A long spear used to protect berry fields from intruders.

Light.name: Quarterstaff of the Orchard Sage
Light.description: A simple yet powerful staff, imbued with the wisdom of the orchard.

Light.name: Scythe of the Harvest Moon
Light.description: A scythe that glows under the harvest moon, reaping more than just crops.

Light.name: Spear of the Thorned Grove
Light.description: A trusty spear with a thorn-like tip, perfect for quick thrusts.

Light.name: Throwing Axe of the Windy Orchard
Light.description: A light axe designed for throwing, whistling through the air like a brisk wind.

Light.name: Dagger of the Swift Cut
Light.description: A small, sharp dagger, ideal for quick, precise cuts.

Light.name: Light Hammer of the Sun's Forge
Light.description: A light hammer imbued with the warmth of the sun, perfect for quick strikes.

Light.name: Hand Axe of the Pruning Artist
Light.description: A hand axe used for delicate pruning, or less delicate combat.

Light.name: Light Mace of the Morning Dew
Light.description: A mace that strikes as refreshingly as the morning dew.

Light.name: Light Pick of the Seedling
Light.description: A small pick used for careful extraction of seeds and sometimes for combat.

Light.name: Sap of the Sweet Sleep
Light.description: A weapon that can knock an opponent out as gently as falling asleep in a field of flowers.

Light.name: Sickle of the Crescent Moon
Light.description: A sickle shaped like a crescent moon, ideal for reaping in the cool night.

Light.name: Short Sword of the Nimble Vine
Light.description: A short sword that moves with the grace and unpredictability of a vine.

Light.name: Battle Axe of the Forest Warrior
Light.description: A sturdy battle axe that tells tales of many forest skirmishes.

Light.name: Club of the Wild Orchard
Light.description: A simple club made from a robust branch, as natural as it is effective.

Light.name: Flail of the Berry Tangle
Light.description: A flail with heads like tangled berries, unpredictable and dangerous.

One-Handed.name: Longsword of the Fruit Knight
One-Handed.description: A longsword wielded by the noble protectors of the fruit realms.

One-Handed.name: Heavy Mace of the Orchard's Might
One-Handed.description: A heavy mace that embodies the strength and resilience of the orchard.

One-Handed.name: Morningstar of the Dawn's Light
One-Handed.description: A morningstar that shines as bright and fierce as the first light of dawn.

One-Handed.name: Heavy Pick of the Deep Roots
One-Handed.description: A pick designed to penetrate as deeply as the roots of an ancient tree.

One-Handed.name: Rapier of the Swift Thorn
One-Handed.description: A rapier as quick and sharp as a thorn, perfect for swift strikes.

One-Handed.name: Scimitar of the Wind's Curve
One-Handed.description: A curved scimitar that slices as effortlessly as the wind through leaves.

One-Handed.name: Short Spear of the Sprout
One-Handed.description: A short spear, easy to handle and ideal for quick jabs.

One-Handed.name: Bastard Sword of the Mixed Orchard
One-Handed.description: A versatile sword, as varied in its use as the fruits in a mixed orchard.

One-Handed.name: Trident of the Tidal Grove
One-Handed.description: A trident that channels the power of water, as vital to life as the grove itself.

One-Handed.name: War Axe of the Ancient Tree
One-Handed.description: A war axe as old and formidable as the oldest tree in the forest.

One-Handed.name: Warhammer of the Stone Fruit
One-Handed.description: A warhammer as hard and unyielding as the pit of a stone fruit.

One-Handed.name: Whip of the Vine's Lash
One-Handed.description: A whip that lashes out as quickly and unpredictably as a wild vine.

Ranged.name: Hand Crossbow of the Nimble Shoot
Ranged.description: A small crossbow, quick to load and fire, like the swift shoot of a new plant.

Ranged.name: Heavy Crossbow of the Mighty Branch
Ranged.description: A heavy crossbow with the strength and sturdiness of a mighty tree branch.

Ranged.name: Light Crossbow of the Sprightly Twig
Ranged.description: A light crossbow, easy to handle and quick to shoot, like a sprightly twig.

Ranged.name: Dart of the Swift Seed
Ranged.description: A small dart, light and fast like a seed carried by the wind.

Ranged.name: Javelin of the Soaring Fruit
Ranged.description: A javelin that flies through the air as gracefully as a fruit falling from a tree.

Ranged.name: Longbow of the Tall Tree
Ranged.description: A longbow as tall and strong as the trees from which it was crafted.

Ranged.name: Net of the Entangling Vines
Ranged.description: A net that entangles like the vines of a dense thicket.

Ranged.name: Shortbow of the Young Sapling
Ranged.description: A shortbow, flexible and resilient like a young sapling.

Ranged.name: Sling of the Stone Fruit
Ranged.description: A simple sling, perfect for hurling small, hard fruits or stones.
